author: NSW Cichlid Society
title: NSW Cichlid Society Fish Auction Liverpool Area - Moorebank | 1318210425
text:
The next NSW Cichlid Society Meeting and Mini Auction will be held on Saturday 4 November 2023, at Nuwarra Public School, Mckay Avenue, Moorebank NSW 2170.
* Members and guests can enter the hall from 6.30pm.
* The meeting will start at 7.30pm.
* The mini auction will start approximately 8.30pm.
WHAT'S ON IN NOVEMBER?
MEMBERS TALK
Cichlids - should we be calling them Cyclids instead? George Wright will be giving a talk on the cycles of the cichlid hobby.
MINI AUCTION
WHAT WILL BE FOR SALE?
We are expecting 70 lots to go up for sale. We aren't able to advise what fish and goods will be available for sale as club members enter their lots on the night just before the auction starts.
An auction will typically have lots of the following for sale (but there is no guarantee these will be for sale on the night):
* African Cichlids - a variety of species from Lake Malawi, Lake Tanganyika, Lake Victoria and also Rift Lakes.
* American Cichlids - a variety of species from large Central Americans to the smaller dwarf American cichlids
* Catfish and plecos - a variety of all different types of catfish, typically including bristlenose and L numbers
* Dry goods - breeding caves, driftwood, aquascaping rocks, filters, etc. Note only brand new electrical items are sold at the auction.
BIDDING RULES
If you want to bid on a fish, please do so early to save any disappointment when you miss out for bidding too late.? All bids are to be made in whole dollar units.
Bids will be in minimum amounts of
$1 increments from $1 to $20.
$2 increments from $20 to $50.
$5 increments beyond $50 and $10 bids after $100.
Note: auctioneers may accept bids less than the increments if they see fit.
PAYMENT
Cash only
WHAT ELSE WILL BE ON?
Members Giveaway - Lucky door prize for members only on the night
Trade Table - For all of your fish food, bagging, and other needs
Supper Table - For your food, snack and drink needs
Raffle - Purchase raffle tickets for your chance to win some great prizes including live fish and dry goods.
ENTRY DETAILS
FINANCIAL MEMBERS
For those members who are financial - ENTRY IS FREE!
You must be a financial member to be eligible for the members giveaway, enter lots into mini auctions, and collect lots for major auctions. See the membership team on the night at the door to manage your membership status.
NON MEMBERS / VISITORS
Entry: $2 per person above 18 years of age (we may ask for ID)
SEE YOU THERE
Saturday 4 November 2023
6.30pm Hall opens to members and guests
7.30pm Meeting starts
8.30pm approximately mini auction starts
Nuwarra Public School,
Mckay Avenue, Moorebank NSW 2170
Entry: $2 per non-member over the age of 18.
Financial Members: Free
Find more information on the NSWCS website: nswcs(dot)org
